sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-autocomplete
  v-model="inputVal"
    class="mx-auto autocomplete-size"
    placeholder="Start typing to search"
    dense
    prepend-icon="mdi-magnify"
    item-text="label"
    return-object
    @click="getItems"
    ref="search"
    color="rgb(255, 168, 20)"
    item-color="rgb(255, 168, 20)"
    dark
    @input="searchInput=null"
    :search-input.sync="searchInput"
  ></v-autocomplete>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "SearchBar",
  data: () => {
    return {
        searchInput: null
    };
  },
  props: ["filteredForms", "autocomplete"],
  methods: {
    customFilter(item, queryText) {
      const text = item.label.toLowerCase();
      const searchText = queryText.toLowerCase();
      return text.indexOf(searchText) > -1;
    },
    getItems(){
        console.log(this.$refs.search)
    }
  },
  computed: {
    inputVal: {
        get() {
            return this.autocomplete;
        },
        set(autocomplete) {
            this.$emit('input', [autocomplete]);
        }
    }
  }
};
</script>
<style>
.autocomplete-size {
  width: 500px;
}
</style>
